name: leather bracers
description: Sturdy bracers made from hardened leather, providing good arm protection.

name: chain mail sleeves
description: Flexible sleeves made of linked metal chains, offering balanced protection.

name: elven armguards
description: Elegantly crafted armguards, light and strong, imbued with elven magic.

name: wizard cuffs
description: Mystical cuffs that protect the arms while amplifying spell power.

name: steel vambraces
description: Robust vambraces forged from steel, ideal for frontline combat.

name: assassin armlets
description: Sleek armlets designed for stealth and agility, favored by assassins.
